title: Trump’s origins in a New York world of con men, mobsters and hustlers
dc:creator: Sean Wilentz
description: Reporter Maggie Haberman charts the city's social and cultural influences that fueled Donald Trump's personal and political rise.

title: ‘Trip to Bountiful’ at Ford’s Theatre is a journey too far back in time
dc:creator: Celia Wren
description: Nostalgia for a bygone America in the 1953 work by Horton Foote lands uneasily today.

title: As ‘Fossora’ makes clear, Björk is an earthling
dc:creator: Chris Richards
description: “Fossora” sounds as otherworldly as ever but her music remains rooted in our fragile ecology.

title: In ‘Mr. Wilder and Me,’ Billy Wilder is a character worthy of his films
dc:creator: Diane Cole
description: You don’t have to be a film buff to love acclaimed British author Jonathan Coe’s at once melancholic and laugh-out-loud funny novel.

title: Would you buy a $400 Marvel action figure? Thousands of people can’t wait.
dc:creator: David Betancourt
description: Hasbro's monstrous 32-inch-tall Galactus could point the way to the future of plastic superhero toys.

title: Sacheen Littlefeather, who declined Brando’s Oscar, dies at 75
dc:creator: Harrison Smith
description: As the first Native American woman to stand onstage at the Oscars, she called out discrimination and injustice against American Indians.

title: What to watch on Monday: ‘The Good Doctor’ returns to ABC
dc:creator: Olivia McCormack
description: Monday, Oct. 3, 2022 | "A Sinister Halloween Scary Opposites Solar Special" airs on Hulu.

title: ‘House of the Dragon’ recap: The queen and eye
dc:creator: Omar Gallaga
description: Here's what you missed from Episode 7 of HBO's "House of the Dragon," entitled "Driftmark."

title: Tom Stoppard’s ‘Leopoldstadt’ on Broadway is simply devastating
dc:creator: Peter Marks
description: A review of Tom Stoppard's sprawling play about Vienna Jews in the 20th century.

title: Lorde jokes that she’s now a ‘radioactive creature’ after Potomac swim
dc:creator: Olivia McCormack
description: The singer told a D.C. audience in August she had taken a swim in the Potomac River. At a Maryland music festival this weekend, she laughed it off.

title: ‘SNL’ opens 48th season with a meta comment about its current condition
dc:creator: Olivia McCormack
description: A self-conscious sketch kicks off "Saturday Night Live's" rebuilding year, minus several beloved cast members.

title: Constance Wu meditates on her mistakes in revealing memoir
dc:creator: Thomas Floyd
description: The "Crazy Rich Asians" star isn’t afraid to look bad in "Making a Scene," her introspective collection of essays.

title: Van Gogh through a pinhole
dc:creator: Sebastian Smee
description: Acclaimed photographer Abelardo Morell uses a revolutionary camera-obscura technique to create artworks inspired by the great masters.

title: MAD magazine’s oldest active artist still spoofs what makes us human
dc:creator: Michael Cavna
description: Sergio Aragonés has drawn for the magazine since he arrived in New York 60 years ago.

title: Biden reinstates arts committee that disbanded under Trump
dc:creator: Kelsey Ables
description: On Friday, the president signed an executive order reestablishing the President’s Committee on the Arts and Humanities
